original: Edstrand, Cari-Gustaf, bruksdisponent, Sy a, f. 27/9/04 i Malmö av dir. Hans E. o. Amanda Mortensen. G. 38 m. Anna-Greta Westerlund. Barn: Hans-Christian f. 38, Ann-Charlotte 41. — Stud:ex. v. Lundsbergs sk. 23, res :off :ex. 25, civiling:ex. v. CTH (M) 30. Kapten v. T. 1. Anst. v. Spångs-liolms Bruks A-B i Sya 31, disp. sed. 38.
translated: Edstrand, Cari-Gustaf, works manager, Sya, b. September 27, 1904 in Malmö, son of director Hans E. and Amanda Mortensen. Married in 1938 to Anna-Greta Westerlund. Children: Hans-Christian, b. 1938, Ann-Charlotte, b. 1941. He graduated from Lundsbergs boardingschool in 1923, and became a reserve officer in 1925. He received his Master of Science in Engineering degree from Chalmers University of Technology (M) in 1930. He was a captain in the Swedish Armed Forces stationed at T1. He was employed at Spångsholm Bruks AB in Sya in 1931, and appointed works manager in 1938.
